archimate:BusinessEvent.name: 4/ ENTREPRISE or "A"EVENT
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
An ENTERPRISE EVENT is requiered to be identify any physical or vistual information consider as realiable , and stable . It then represents the point of entry to trigger an ENTREPRISE PROCESS as well as the planned or abnormal outcomes of this process.
It can be generated by any internal or external ENTERPRISE SERVICE to cascade action/reaction internally or externally at entreprise level.
Event at enterprise level are then declined as PROCESS EVENT(40) to allow the business process execution in every department , location or program of the entreprise accordingly with entrerpise rules ( like a Quality System) .
